# Avatar Group

## Usage:

```html
<p-avatar-group>
    <p-avatar src="url" />
    <p-avatar src="url" />
    <p-avatar src="url" />
</p-avatar-group>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                          | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `extra`  | `extra`   | The amount to show after the avatars | `number` | `undefined` |
